015package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
018import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
019import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
020import static de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseInfo.PG_DEFAULT_DB;
021import static de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseInfo.PG_DEFAULT_USER;
022import static de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.EmbeddedUtil.formatDuration;
023import static java.lang.String.format;
024
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.FileOutputStream;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.io.InputStreamReader;
029import java.net.ConnectException;
030import java.net.InetAddress;
031import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
032import java.net.Socket;
033import java.nio.channels.FileLock;
034import java.nio.channels.OverlappingFileLockException;
035import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
036import java.nio.file.Path;
037import java.sql.Connection;
038import java.sql.ResultSet;
039import java.sql.SQLException;
040import java.sql.Statement;
041import java.time.Duration;
042import java.util.HashMap;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Map.Entry;
046import java.util.Objects;
047import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
048import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
049import java.util.stream.Collectors;
050import javax.annotation.Nullable;
051import javax.sql.DataSource;
052
053import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
054import com.google.common.base.MoreObjects;
055import com.google.common.base.Stopwatch;
056import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
057import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
058import com.google.common.io.CharStreams;
059import com.google.common.io.Closeables;
060import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
061import org.postgresql.ds.PGSimpleDataSource;
062import org.slf4j.Logger;
063import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

065/**
066 * Manages an embedded PostgreSQL server instance.
067 */
068public final class EmbeddedPostgres implements AutoCloseable {
069
070    static final String[] LOCALHOST_SERVER_NAMES = new String[]{"localhost"};
071
072    private static final String PG_TEMPLATE_DB = "template1";
073
074    @VisibleForTesting
075    public static final Duration DEFAULT_PG_STARTUP_WAIT = Duration.ofSeconds(10);
076
077    // folders need to be at least 10 minutes old to be considered for deletion.
078    private static final long MINIMUM_AGE_IN_MS = Duration.ofMinutes(10).toMillis();
079
080    // prefix for data folders in the parent that might be deleted
081    private static final String DATA_DIRECTORY_PREFIX = "epd-";
082
083    private static final String PG_STOP_MODE = "fast";
084    private static final String PG_STOP_WAIT_SECONDS = "5";
085    static final String LOCK_FILE_NAME = "epg-lock";
086
087    private final Logger logger;
088
089    private final String instanceId;
090    private final File pgDir;
091    private final File dataDirectory;
092
093    private final Duration serverStartupWait;
094    private final int port;
095    private final AtomicBoolean started = new AtomicBoolean();
096    private final AtomicBoolean closed = new AtomicBoolean();
097
098    private final ImmutableMap<String, String> serverConfiguration;
099    private final ImmutableMap<String, String> localeConfiguration;
100    private final ImmutableMap<String, String> connectionProperties;
101
102    private final File lockFile;
103    private volatile FileOutputStream lockStream;
104    private volatile FileLock lock;
105
106    private final boolean removeDataOnShutdown;
107
108    private final ProcessBuilder.Redirect errorRedirector;
109    private final ProcessBuilder.Redirect outputRedirector;
110
111
112    /**
113     * Returns an instance that has been started and configured. The {@link Builder#withDefaults()} configuration has been applied.
114     */
115    public static EmbeddedPostgres defaultInstance() throws IOException {
116        return builderWithDefaults().build();
117    }
118
119    /**
120     * Returns a builder with default {@link Builder#withDefaults()} configuration already applied.
121     */
122    public static EmbeddedPostgres.Builder builderWithDefaults() {
123        return new Builder().withDefaults();
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Returns a new {@link Builder}.
128     */
129    public static EmbeddedPostgres.Builder builder() {
130        return new Builder();
131    }
132
133    private EmbeddedPostgres(
134            final String instanceId,
135            final File postgresInstallDirectory,
136            final File dataDirectory,
137            final boolean removeDataOnShutdown,
138            final Map<String, String> serverConfiguration,
139            final Map<String, String> localeConfiguration,
140            final Map<String, String> connectionProperties,
141            final int port,
142            final ProcessBuilder.Redirect errorRedirector,
143            final ProcessBuilder.Redirect outputRedirector,
144            final Duration serverStartupWait) {
145
146        this.instanceId = checkNotNull(instanceId, "instanceId is null");
147
148        this.logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(toString());
149
150        this.pgDir = checkNotNull(postgresInstallDirectory, "postgresInstallDirectory is null");
151        this.dataDirectory = checkNotNull(dataDirectory, "dataDirectory is null");
152
153        this.removeDataOnShutdown = removeDataOnShutdown;
154
155        this.serverConfiguration = ImmutableMap.copyOf(checkNotNull(serverConfiguration, "serverConfiguration is null"));
156        this.localeConfiguration = ImmutableMap.copyOf(checkNotNull(localeConfiguration, "localeConfiguration is null"));
157        this.connectionProperties = ImmutableMap.copyOf(checkNotNull(connectionProperties, "connectionProperties is null"));
158
159        this.port = port;
160
161        this.errorRedirector = checkNotNull(errorRedirector, "errorRedirector is null");
162        this.outputRedirector = checkNotNull(outputRedirector, "outputRedirector is null");
163
164        this.serverStartupWait = checkNotNull(serverStartupWait, "serverStartupWait is null");
165        this.lockFile = new File(this.dataDirectory, LOCK_FILE_NAME);
166
167        logger.debug(format("data dir is %s, install dir is %s", this.dataDirectory, this.pgDir));
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Creates a {@link DatabaseInfo} object describing the default database (the <pre>postgres</pre>).
172     */
173    public DatabaseInfo createDefaultDatabaseInfo() {
174        return DatabaseInfo.builder().port(getPort()).properties(this.connectionProperties).build();
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Creates a {@link DataSource} object that connects to the standard system database (normally <pre>template1</pre>).
179     * <p>
180     * Any modification to this database will be propagated to any new database that is created with <pre>CREATE DATABASE...</pre> unless another database is
181     * explicitly named as the template..
182     */
183    public DataSource createTemplateDataSource() throws SQLException {
184        return createDataSource(PG_DEFAULT_USER, PG_TEMPLATE_DB, getPort(), this.connectionProperties);
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Creates a {@link DataSource} object that connects to the default database (<pre>postgres</pre>).
189     */
190    public DataSource createDefaultDataSource() throws SQLException {
191        return createDataSource(PG_DEFAULT_USER, PG_DEFAULT_DB, getPort(), this.connectionProperties);
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * Creates a {@link DataSource} with a specific user and database name.
196     * <p>
197     * Creating the DataSource does <b>not</b> create the database or the user itself. This must be done by the calling code (e.g. with a {@link
198     * DatabasePreparer}).
199     */
200    public DataSource createDataSource(String user, String databaseName) throws SQLException {
201        return createDataSource(user, databaseName, getPort(), this.connectionProperties);
202    }
203
204    static DataSource createDataSource(String user, String databaseName, int port, Map<String, String> properties) throws SQLException {
205        checkNotNull(user, "user is null");
206        checkNotNull(databaseName, "databaseName is null");
207        checkNotNull(properties, "properties is null");
208
209        final PGSimpleDataSource ds = new PGSimpleDataSource();
210
211        ds.setServerNames(LOCALHOST_SERVER_NAMES);
212        ds.setPortNumbers(new int[]{port});
213        ds.setDatabaseName(databaseName);
214        ds.setUser(user);
215
216        for (final Entry<String, String> entry : properties.entrySet()) {
217            ds.setProperty(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
218        }
219
220        return ds;
221    }
222
223    /**
224     * Returns the network port for the PostgreSQL server instance.
225     */
226    public int getPort() {
227        return port;
228    }
229
230    /**
231     * Returns the connection properties for the PostgreSQL server instance.
232     */
233    ImmutableMap<String, String> getConnectionProperties() {
234        return connectionProperties;
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * Returns the instance id for the PostgreSQL server instance. This id is an alphanumeric string that can be used to differentiate between multiple embedded
239     * PostgreSQL server instances.
240     */
241    public String instanceId() {
242        return instanceId;
243    }
244
245    @Override
246    public String toString() {
247        return this.getClass().getName() + "$" + this.instanceId;
248    }
249
250    @Override
251    public boolean equals(Object o) {
252        if (this == o) {
253            return true;
254        }
255        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
256            return false;
257        }
258        EmbeddedPostgres that = (EmbeddedPostgres) o;
259        return instanceId.equals(that.instanceId);
260    }
261
262    @Override
263    public int hashCode() {
264        return Objects.hash(instanceId);
265    }
266
267    // internal methods
268
269
270    private void boot() throws IOException {
271        EmbeddedUtil.mkdirs(this.dataDirectory);
272
273        if (this.removeDataOnShutdown || !new File(this.dataDirectory, "postgresql.conf").exists()) {
274            initDatabase();
275        }
276
277        lock();
278
279        startDatabase();
280    }
281
282
283    private synchronized void lock() throws IOException {
284        this.lockStream = new FileOutputStream(this.lockFile);
285        this.lock = lockStream.getChannel().tryLock();
286        checkState(lock != null, "could not lock %s", lockFile);
287    }
288
289    private synchronized void unlock() throws IOException {
290        if (lock != null) {
291            lock.release();
292        }
293        Closeables.close(lockStream, true);
294    }
295
296    private void initDatabase() throws IOException {
297        ImmutableList.Builder<String> commandBuilder = ImmutableList.builder();
298        commandBuilder.add(pgBin("initdb"))
299                .addAll(createLocaleOptions())
300                .add("-A", "trust",
301                        "-U", PG_DEFAULT_USER,
302                        "-D", this.dataDirectory.getPath(),
303                        "-E", "UTF-8");
304        final Stopwatch watch = system(commandBuilder.build());
305        logger.debug(format("initdb completed in %s", formatDuration(watch.elapsed())));
306    }
307
308    private void startDatabase() throws IOException {
309        checkState(!started.getAndSet(true), "database already started!");
310
311        final ImmutableList.Builder<String> commandBuilder = ImmutableList.builder();
312        commandBuilder.add(pgBin("pg_ctl"),
313                "-D", this.dataDirectory.getPath(),
314                "-o", createInitOptions().stream().collect(Collectors.joining(" ")),
315                "start"
316        );
317
318        final Stopwatch watch = Stopwatch.createStarted();
319        final Process postmaster = spawn("pg", commandBuilder.build());
320
321        logger.info(format("started as pid %d on port %d", postmaster.pid(), port));
322        logger.debug(format("Waiting up to %s for server startup to finish", formatDuration(serverStartupWait)));
323
324        Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(newCloserThread());
325
326        checkState(waitForServerStartup(), "Could not start pg, interrupted?");
327        logger.debug(format("startup complete in %s", formatDuration(watch.elapsed())));
328    }
329
330    private void stopDatabase(File dataDirectory) throws IOException {
331        final ImmutableList.Builder<String> commandBuilder = ImmutableList.builder();
332        commandBuilder.add(pgBin("pg_ctl"),
333                "-D", dataDirectory.getPath(),
334                "stop",
335                "-m", PG_STOP_MODE,
336                "-t", PG_STOP_WAIT_SECONDS, "-w");
337
338        final Stopwatch watch = system(commandBuilder.build());
339        logger.debug(format("shutdown complete in %s", formatDuration(watch.elapsed())));
340    }
341
342    private List<String> createInitOptions() {
343        final ImmutableList.Builder<String> initOptions = ImmutableList.builder();
344        initOptions.add(
345                "-p", Integer.toString(port),
346                "-F");
347
348        serverConfiguration.forEach((k, v) -> {
349            initOptions.add("-c");
350            initOptions.add(k + "=" + v);
351        });
352
353        return initOptions.build();
354    }
355
356    @VisibleForTesting
357    List<String> createLocaleOptions() {
358        final ImmutableList.Builder<String> localeOptions = ImmutableList.builder();
359
360        localeConfiguration.forEach((key, value) -> {
361            if (value.length() > 0) {
362                localeOptions.add("--" + key + "=" + value);
363            } else {
364                localeOptions.add("--" + key);
365            }
366        });
367        return localeOptions.build();
368    }
369
370    private boolean waitForServerStartup() throws IOException {
371        Throwable lastCause = null;
372        final long start = System.nanoTime();
373        final long maxWaitNs = TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS.convert(serverStartupWait.toMillis(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
374        while (System.nanoTime() - start < maxWaitNs) {
375            try {
376                if (verifyReady()) {
377                    return true;
378                }
379            } catch (final SQLException e) {
380                lastCause = e;
381                logger.trace("while waiting for server startup:", e);
382            }
383
384            try {
385                Thread.sleep(100);
386            } catch (final InterruptedException e) {
387                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
388                return false;
389            }
390        }
391        throw new IOException("Gave up waiting for server to start after " + serverStartupWait.toMillis() + "ms", lastCause);
392    }
393
394    private boolean verifyReady() throws IOException, SQLException {
395        // check TCP connection
396        final InetAddress localhost = InetAddress.getLoopbackAddress();
397        try (Socket sock = new Socket()) {
398            sock.setSoTimeout((int) Duration.ofMillis(500).toMillis());
399            sock.connect(new InetSocketAddress(localhost, port), (int) Duration.ofMillis(500).toMillis());
400        } catch (ConnectException e) {
401            return false;
402        }
403
404        // check JDBC connection
405        try (Connection c = createDefaultDataSource().getConnection();
406                Statement s = c.createStatement();
407                ResultSet rs = s.executeQuery("SELECT 1")) {
408            checkState(rs.next(), "expecting single row");
409            checkState(rs.getInt(1) == 1, "expecting 1 as result");
410            checkState(!rs.next(), "expecting single row");
411            return true;
412        }
413    }
414
415    private Thread newCloserThread() {
416        final Thread closeThread = new Thread(() -> {
417            try {
418                EmbeddedPostgres.this.close();
419            } catch (IOException e) {
420                logger.trace("while closing instance:", e);
421            }
422        });
423
424        closeThread.setName("pg-closer");
425        return closeThread;
426    }
427
428    /**
429     * Closing an {@link EmbeddedPostgres} instance shuts down the connected database instance.
430     */
431    @Override
432    public void close() throws IOException {
433        if (closed.getAndSet(true)) {
434            return;
435        }
436
437        try {
438            stopDatabase(this.dataDirectory);
439        } catch (final Exception e) {
440            logger.error("could not stop pg:", e);
441        }
442
443        unlock();
444
445        if (removeDataOnShutdown) {
446            try {
447                EmbeddedUtil.rmdirs(dataDirectory);
448            } catch (Exception e) {
449                logger.error(format("Could not clean up directory %s:", dataDirectory.getAbsolutePath()), e);
450            }
451        } else {
452            logger.debug(format("preserved data directory %s", dataDirectory.getAbsolutePath()));
453        }
454    }
455
456    @VisibleForTesting
457    File getDataDirectory() {
458        return dataDirectory;
459    }
460
461    @VisibleForTesting
462    Map<String, String> getLocaleConfiguration() {
463        return localeConfiguration;
464    }
465
466
467    @SuppressFBWarnings("RCN_REDUNDANT_NULLCHECK_OF_NONNULL_VALUE")
468    private void cleanOldDataDirectories(File parentDirectory) {
469        final File[] children = parentDirectory.listFiles();
470        if (children == null) {
471            return;
472        }
473        for (final File dir : children) {
474            if (!dir.isDirectory()) {
475                continue;
476            }
477
478            // only ever touch known data directories.
479            if (!dir.getName().startsWith(DATA_DIRECTORY_PREFIX)) {
480                continue;
481            }
482
483            // only touch data directories that hold a lock file.
484            final File lockFile = new File(dir, LOCK_FILE_NAME);
485            if (!lockFile.exists()) {
486                continue;
487            }
488
489            // file must have a minimum age. This can not be the same check as
490            // the exists b/c non-existent files return 0 (epoch) as lastModified so
491            // they are considered "ancient".
492            if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lockFile.lastModified() < MINIMUM_AGE_IN_MS) {
493                continue;
494            }
495
496            try (FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(lockFile);
497                    FileLock lock = fos.getChannel().tryLock()) {
498                if (lock != null) {
499                    logger.debug(format("found stale data directory %s", dir));
500                    if (new File(dir, "postmaster.pid").exists()) {
501                        try {
502                            stopDatabase(dir);
503                            logger.debug("shutting down orphaned database!");
504                        } catch (Exception e) {
505                            logger.warn(format("failed to orphaned database in %s:", dir), e);
506                        }
507                    }
508                    EmbeddedUtil.rmdirs(dir);
509                }
510            } catch (final OverlappingFileLockException e) {
511                // The directory belongs to another instance in this VM.
512                logger.trace("while cleaning old data directories:", e);
513            } catch (final Exception e) {
514                logger.warn("while cleaning old data directories:", e);
515            }
516        }
517    }
518
519    private String pgBin(String binaryName) {
520        final String extension = EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_WINDOWS ? ".exe" : "";
521        return new File(this.pgDir, "bin/" + binaryName + extension).getPath();
522    }
523
524    private Process spawn(@Nullable String processName, List<String> commandAndArgs) throws IOException {
525        final ProcessBuilder builder = new ProcessBuilder(commandAndArgs);
526        builder.redirectErrorStream(true);
527        builder.redirectError(errorRedirector);
528        builder.redirectOutput(outputRedirector);
529        final Process process = builder.start();
530
531        processName = processName != null ? processName : process.info().command().map(EmbeddedUtil::getFileBaseName).orElse("<unknown>");
532        String name = format("%s (%d)", processName, process.pid());
533
534        ProcessOutputLogger.logOutput(logger, name, process);
535        return process;
536    }
537
538
539    private Stopwatch system(List<String> commandAndArgs) throws IOException {
540        checkArgument(commandAndArgs.size() > 0, "No commandAndArgs given!");
541        String prefix = EmbeddedUtil.getFileBaseName(commandAndArgs.get(0));
542
543        Stopwatch watch = Stopwatch.createStarted();
544        Process process = spawn(prefix, commandAndArgs);
545        try {
546            if (process.waitFor() != 0) {
547                try (InputStreamReader reader = new InputStreamReader(process.getErrorStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
548                    throw new IllegalStateException(format("Process %s failed%n%s",
549                            commandAndArgs, CharStreams.toString(reader)));
550                }
551            }
552        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
553            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
554        }
555
556        return watch;
557    }
558
559
560    /**
561     * Callback interface to customize a builder during creation.
562     */
563    @FunctionalInterface
564    public interface BuilderCustomizer {
565
566        /**
567         * Callback to customize a given {@link Builder}.
568         *
569         * @param builder The builder instance. Any method on the builder can be called.
570         * @throws SQLException For any SQL related problems.
571         * @throws IOException  For any IO related problem.
572         */
573        void customize(Builder builder) throws IOException, SQLException;
574    }
575
576    /**
577     * Creates a new {@link EmbeddedPostgres} instance and starts it.
578     */
579    public static class Builder {
580
581        private File installationDirectory = null;
582        private File dataDirectory = null;
583
584        private final Map<String, String> serverConfiguration = new HashMap<>();
585        private final Map<String, String> localeConfiguration = new HashMap<>();
586        private boolean removeDataOnShutdown = true;
587        private int port = 0;
588        private final Map<String, String> connectionProperties = new HashMap<>();
589        private PgDirectoryResolver directoryResolver = UncompressBundleDirectoryResolver.getDefault();
590        private Duration serverStartupWait = DEFAULT_PG_STARTUP_WAIT;
591
592        private ProcessBuilder.Redirect errRedirector = ProcessBuilder.Redirect.PIPE;
593        private ProcessBuilder.Redirect outRedirector = ProcessBuilder.Redirect.PIPE;
594
595        Builder() {
596        }
597
598        /**
599         * Apply a set of defaults to the database server:
600         * <ul>
601         *     <li>timezone: UTC</li>
602         *     <li>synchronous_commit: off</li>
603         *     <li>max_connections: 300</li>
604         * </ul>
605         *
606         * @return The builder itself.
607         */
608        public Builder withDefaults() {
609            serverConfiguration.put("timezone", "UTC");
610            serverConfiguration.put("synchronous_commit", "off");
611            serverConfiguration.put("max_connections", "300");
612            return this;
613        }
614
615        /**
616         * Sets the time that the builder will wait for the PostgreSQL server instance to start. Default is 10 seconds.
617         *
618         * @param serverStartupWait Startup wait time. Must not be null or negative.
619         * @return The builder itself.
620         */
621        public Builder setServerStartupWait(Duration serverStartupWait) {
622            checkNotNull(serverStartupWait, "serverStartupWait is null");
623            checkArgument(!serverStartupWait.isNegative(), "Negative durations are not permitted.");
624
625            this.serverStartupWait = serverStartupWait;
626            return this;
627        }
628
629        /**
630         * Whether to remove the data directory on server shutdown. If true, the contents of the data directory are deleted when the {@link EmbeddedPostgres}
631         * instance is closed. Default is true.
632         *
633         * @param removeDataOnShutdown True removes the contents of the data directory on shutdown.
634         * @return The builder itself.
635         */
636        public Builder setRemoveDataOnShutdown(boolean removeDataOnShutdown) {
637            this.removeDataOnShutdown = removeDataOnShutdown;
638            return this;
639        }
640
641        /**
642         * Explicitly set the location of the data directory. Default is using a managed directory.
643         *
644         * @param dataDirectory The directory to use. Must not be null. If it exists, the current user must be able to access the directory for reading and
645         *                      writing. If the directory does not exist then the current user must be able to create it for reading and writing.
646         * @return The builder itself.
647         */
648        public Builder setDataDirectory(Path dataDirectory) {
649            checkNotNull(dataDirectory, "dataDirectory is null");
650            return setDataDirectory(dataDirectory.toFile());
651        }
652
653        /**
654         * Explicitly set the location of the data directory. Default is using a managed directory.
655         *
656         * @param dataDirectory The directory to use. Must not be null. If it exists, the current user must be able to access the directory for reading and
657         *                      writing. If the directory does not exist then the current user must be able to create it for reading and writing.
658         * @return The builder itself.
659         */
660        public Builder setDataDirectory(String dataDirectory) {
661            checkNotNull(dataDirectory, "dataDirectory is null");
662            return setDataDirectory(new File(dataDirectory));
663        }
664
665        /**
666         * Explicitly set the location of the data directory. Default is using a managed directory.
667         *
668         * @param dataDirectory The directory to use. Must not be null. If it exists, the current user must be able to access the directory for reading and
669         *                      writing. If the directory does not exist then the current user must be able to create it for reading and writing.
670         * @return The builder itself.
671         */
672        public Builder setDataDirectory(File dataDirectory) {
673            this.dataDirectory = checkNotNull(dataDirectory, "dataDirectory is null");
674            return this;
675        }
676
677        /**
678         * Adds a server configuration parameter. All parameters are passed to the PostgreSQL server a startup using the <code>postgres</code> command.
679         * <p>
680         * Values and their function are specific to the PostgreSQL version selected.
681         * <p>
682         * See https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/runtime-config.html for more information.
683         *
684         * @param key   Configuration parameter name. Must not be null.
685         * @param value Configuration parameter value. Must not be null.
686         * @return The builder itself.
687         */
688        public Builder addServerConfiguration(String key, String value) {
689            checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
690            checkNotNull(value, "value is null");
691            this.serverConfiguration.put(key, value);
692            return this;
693        }
694
695        /**
696         * @deprecated Use {@link #addInitDbConfiguration} instead.
697         */
698        @Deprecated
699        public Builder addLocaleConfiguration(String key, String value) {
700            checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
701            checkNotNull(value, "value is null");
702            this.localeConfiguration.put(key, value);
703            return this;
704        }
705
706        /**
707         * Adds a configuration parameters for the <code>initdb</code> command that is used to create the PostgreSQL server.
708         * <p>
709         * Each value is added as a command line parameter to the command.
710         * <p>
711         * See https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/app-initdb.html for an overview of possible values.
712         *
713         * @param key   initdb parameter name. Must not be null.
714         * @param value initdb parameter value. Must not be null. When the empty string is used as the value, the resulting command line parameter will not have
715         *              a equal sign and a value assigned.
716         * @return The builder itself.
717         */
718        public Builder addInitDbConfiguration(String key, String value) {
719            checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
720            checkNotNull(value, "value is null");
721            this.localeConfiguration.put(key, value);
722            return this;
723        }
724
725        /**
726         * @param key
727         * @param value
728         * @return The builder itself.
729         */
730        public Builder addConnectionProperty(String key, String value) {
731            checkNotNull(key, "key is null");
732            checkNotNull(value, "value is null");
733            this.connectionProperties.put(key, value);
734            return this;
735        }
736
737        /**
738         * @param installationDirectory
739         * @return The builder itself.
740         */
741        public Builder setInstallationDirectory(File installationDirectory) {
742            checkNotNull(installationDirectory, "workingDirectory is null");
743            this.installationDirectory = installationDirectory;
744            return this;
745        }
746
747        /**
748         * @param port
749         * @return The builder itself.
750         */
751        public Builder setPort(int port) {
752            this.port = port;
753            return this;
754        }
755
756        /**
757         * @param errRedirector
758         * @return The builder itself.
759         */
760        public Builder setErrorRedirector(ProcessBuilder.Redirect errRedirector) {
761            this.errRedirector = checkNotNull(errRedirector, "errRedirector is null");
762            return this;
763        }
764
765        /**
766         * @param outRedirector
767         * @return The builder itself.
768         */
769        public Builder setOutputRedirector(ProcessBuilder.Redirect outRedirector) {
770            this.outRedirector = checkNotNull(outRedirector, "outRedirector is null");
771            return this;
772        }
773
774        /**
775         * @param directoryResolver
776         * @return The builder itself.
777         */
778        public Builder setPostgresDirectoryResolver(PgDirectoryResolver directoryResolver) {
779            this.directoryResolver = checkNotNull(directoryResolver, "directoryResolver is null");
780            return this;
781        }
782
783        /**
784         * @param directory
785         * @return The builder itself.
786         */
787        public Builder setPostgresBinaryDirectory(File directory) {
788            checkNotNull(directory, "directory is null");
789            return setPostgresDirectoryResolver((x) -> directory);
790        }
791
792        /**
793         * @return
794         * @throws IOException
795         */
796        public EmbeddedPostgres build() throws IOException {
797            // Builder Id
798            final String instanceId = EmbeddedUtil.randomAlphaNumeric(16);
799
800            int port = this.port != 0 ? this.port : EmbeddedUtil.allocatePort();
801
802            // installation root if nothing has been set by the user.
803            final File parentDirectory = EmbeddedUtil.getWorkingDirectory();
804            EmbeddedUtil.mkdirs(parentDirectory);
805
806            final File installationDirectory = MoreObjects.firstNonNull(this.installationDirectory, parentDirectory);
807            final File postgresInstallDirectory = directoryResolver.getDirectory(installationDirectory);
808
809            final File dataDirectory;
810            if (this.dataDirectory != null) {
811                dataDirectory = this.dataDirectory;
812            } else {
813                dataDirectory = new File(parentDirectory, DATA_DIRECTORY_PREFIX + instanceId);
814            }
815
816            EmbeddedPostgres embeddedPostgres = new EmbeddedPostgres(instanceId, postgresInstallDirectory, dataDirectory,
817                    removeDataOnShutdown, serverConfiguration, localeConfiguration, connectionProperties,
818                    port, errRedirector, outRedirector,
819                    serverStartupWait);
820
821            embeddedPostgres.cleanOldDataDirectories(parentDirectory);
822
823            embeddedPostgres.boot();
824
825            return embeddedPostgres;
826        }
827    }
828}
